This item is now Free.

Compatible with iOS 7 - 12

HUD Customizer allows you to fully customize the volume and media HUD in any way you want. Personalize your device even more by modifying every little detail of all your system HUDs.

HUD Customizer allows you to customize:
-	Texts
-	Animations
-	Size
-	Position
-	Colors

You can choose from many presets or set your own custom values. Expect that you can add new things to the HUD like a border or even change the corner radius. You can also fine tune the show / hide animations by choosing the type, duration or even time function.
The only limit is your imagination, take full control and change the boring HUD to a fancy one.

Works on all iOS devices with iOS 7, 8 and 9.
Configure options from Settings app
